
# 0.float.浮点数




## 科学计数
```py
>>> float(5123e-5)
0.05123
>>> float(5123e-10)
5.123e-07
>>> float(5123e5)
512300000.0
>>> float(5123e10)
51230000000000.0
```





## 输出控制

```py
f"{b}"
>>> '3.141592653589793'
```

### 控制精度
```py
import math
math.e
>>> 2.718281828459045
math.pi
>>> 3.141592653589793
b = math.pi
f"{b:.30f}"
>>> '3.141592653589793115997963468544'
f"{b:.40f}"
>>> '3.1415926535897931159979634685441851615906'
f"{b:.50f}"
>>> '3.14159265358979311599796346854418516159057617187500'
f"{b:.100f}"
>>> '3.1415926535897931159979634685441851615905761718750000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000'
```

### 对齐（左右居中）
```py
f"{b:20.10f}"
>>> '        3.1415926536'
f"{b:<20.10f}"
>>> '3.1415926536        '
f"{b:^20.10f}"
>>> '    3.1415926536    '
f"{b:>20.10f}"
>>> '        3.1415926536'
```
